title: DDFP 226: Super Bowl XLVIII preview
itunes:title: DDFP 226: Super Bowl XLVIII preview
description:
Shek, Rank & Handsome Hank address all Super Bowl-related matters before they depart for New York City. Topics include thoughts on Richard Sherman, who will be the Super Bowl XLVIII MVP, how the Seahawks should use Percy Harvin, and what impact a win or loss will have on Peyton Manning's legacy? Plus, some Pro Bowl and "Game of Thrones" discussion. Also, follow @NFLcomLIVE - the official handle for the "NFL.com LIVE: Super Bowl XLVIII" show hosted by Dave Dameshek, Adam Rank, Matt "Money" Smith and Molly Qerim. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
